SEARCH
Package boundary

Class PatientMenu

java.lang.Object
boundary.PatientMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
interfaces.MenuInterface
public class PatientMenu extends Object implements interfaces.MenuInterface
The PatientMenu class implements the MenuInterface and represents the menu of options available to a patient within the hospital management system. It handles patient-specific actions such as viewing personal information, managing appointments, viewing medical records, and handling bills.

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      public void displayMenu()
      Displays the menu of options available to the patient and handles their input. This method allows the patient to perform various actions such as viewing personal information, managing appointments, viewing medical records, managing bills, and providing feedback for doctors.

      It continuously prompts the user until the user chooses to log out.

      Specified by:
      displayMenu in interface interfaces.MenuInterface
